title: Riot ticket time
body: i just wanted to ask how long does riot take to reply because i got scammed by a user to click on a link it looked exactly the same as the one you log in to here on the website and by mistake i typed in my acc and password he logged in and started sending this to everyone on my friend list i want to change my password but i need to know my email and i actually forgot it so i send a ticket to riot the problem is its kinda late and im waiting for riot response and i dont wanna stop watching my acc so incase he logs in i can log in back so the client wont work from his side

replies.body: Don't worry we can help!  Some queues are a little bit higher right now because of the holidays, but I believe the account team is in a good spot right now.  If you have a ticket number I'd be happy to check on the status for you!
#33092532 i wish u would do because i want to sleep but i cant leave the account for him thank u in advance

Don't worry, I verified that your ticket has been received and fielded to our account team to assist!  In the meantime, I locked your account to kick off any unauthorized access.  Rest easy, friend.  :D
btw i have 1 more question how will they identify if its me or the hacker because both of us got the account and password and i forgot the email
thank u very much now i can (sleep in peace)
